channel.title: Any way to stop this error?
channel.description:
Loaded WorldMap In (101 ms)... Your server is now online. Connection from ------------------------------ Andy: character file not found. Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Andy. java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:129) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:182) at client.packetProcess(client.java:18842) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:271) at process.run(process.java:16) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client Andy disconnected (------------------)
I got rid of the IPs but the error for packets is the same.. anyway to prevent this?

item.title: Any way to stop this error?
item.dc:creator: @Mini_Guy_123 Mini Guy 123
item.description:
@Mini_Guy_123 wrote:

Loaded WorldMap In (101 ms)…
Your server is now online.
Connection from ------------------------------
Andy: character file not found.
Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Andy.
java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed
at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method)
at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:129)
at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:182)
at client.packetProcess(client.java:18842)
at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:271)
at process.run(process.java:16)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
ClientHandler: Client Andy disconnected (------------------)

I got rid of the IPs but the error for packets is the same… anyway to prevent this?

Read full topic
item.source: Any way to stop this error?
